mapper.update: update comment set comcontent=#{comcontent}, artid=#{artid}, comtime=#{comtime} where comid=#{comid};
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where pass=1;
select * from comment com,guest g where com.gid=g.gid and com.pass=1 order by com.comtime desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select count(*) from comment where pass=0;
select * from comment com,guest g where com.gid=g.gid and com.pass=0 order by com.comtime desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select * from comment com,guest g where com.gid=g.gid order by com.comtime desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
select count(*) from comment where gid=#{gid};
select * from comment com,guest g where com.gid=g.gid and com.gid=#{gid} order by com.comtime desc limit #{startindex},#{pagesize};
